message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but I'm looking to spend closer to $130. Would you be willing to go that low?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob! However, I'm not quite ready to go down to $130. How about we meet in the middle at $137.50?
